description:
Martı is everywhere, any time! 

Martı is a transportation application that allows you to reach wherever you want, whenever you want. By requesting a vehicle under the TAG option in Martı, you can go wherever you want to go in the comfort of a private vehicle, and you can go to your destination you want to reach with an electric vehicle (scooter, mobilet, moped) in a fun, fast and environmentally friendly way. 

Martı has come to your city with fun and technology so that you don’t waste your precious time in the traffic, don’t be late to the meetings with your friends, walk 15 minutes from the bus you got off to and don't rush to catch the minibus! The most environmental transportation option of the streets, Martı offers you an affordable, on demand and a fun scooter, mobilet & moped ride experience. If you want to go faster and in the comfort of a private vehicle, you can request a vehicle with TAG and go anywhere you want. 

How to use TAG? 
- Download the MARTI: TAG & Scooter app! 
- Enter the TAG tab that will be displayed if TAG services are available in your area. 
- Set your destination. 
- Select the type of vehicle you want to request and press the “LET'S GO” button. 
- With the vehicle that comes to you, you can reach wherever you want, in the comfort of a private vehicle! 
- Request TAG and go! 
 
How to use Martı Scooter, Mobilet or Moped? 
- Download the MARTI: TAG & Scooter app! 
- Check the availble vehicles (scooters, mobilets, mopeds) around you on the map and find the neareast vehicle. 
- Press the "START TO RIDE", scan the QR code of the scooter or mobilet or moped, start your ride. 
- If you are using a Martı Scooter, it will start when you push with your foot and press the throttle button. 
- If you are using the Martı Mobilet, close the side stand and start using the Martı Mobilet by turning the throttle on your right. 
- If you are using a Martı Moped, put on your helmet and start using the Martı Moped by turning the throttle on your right. 
- Get on the vehicle you want and enjoy the journey. Please use all vehicles according to traffic rules. 
- When you want to end your ride, park according to the rules and end your ride by taking a photo of the entire vehicle (scooter, mobilet, moped). 

When can you use Martı ? 
You can use Martı whenever you want. Don't forget that you have to obey the traffic rules while driving the Martı Scooter, Martı Mobilet or Martı Moped. 

Would you like to have TAG, scooter, mobilet or moped in your city? Or do you have suggestions that you want to share with us? You can reach us at support@marti.tech. 

To make city transportation easy, start riding with electric vehicles, which can be rented, or request TAG and go wherever you want in the comfort of a private vehicle!

Flight ticket, bus ticket, car rental, hotel reservation, and ferry ticket... You can access all of these with one click, all at the same time with obilet!
In 2020, Obilet was selected as Turkey’s fastest-growing travel platform by Deloitte, and now it’s right in your pocket! Thanks to Obilet’s mobile app, you can purchase your desired flight, bus, or ferry tickets, rent a car from the company of your choice, and easily make reservations at your dream hotel.
Obilet allows you to instantly list domestic and international flight and bus tickets, dozens of car rental options, and the most exclusive hotels. You can compare prices, find the most attractive option for you, and buy it with a single click using your credit or debit card.
Download Obilet now to enjoy your trip in the most comfortable way!
Instant Solution with 24/7 Customer Service
Whatever your transaction, our customer service team is with you 24/7! You can connect to live support with a single click through the application, or you can reach our customer representative by calling our call center!
Secure Payment System
No matter where you are, you can easily complete all your ticket purchases and reservations through your mobile phone. Your transactions are carried out quickly and securely, leaving you only to plan your journey.  
Plan Your Trip with Advantageous Prices
Obilet offers you the opportunity to search and compare bus and flight tickets, and car rental options of all companies. Thus, you can easily find the ticket or car appropriate for your budget and make your reservation instantly.
Reach out to Turkey's Most Exclusive Companies with Obilet
We have brought together Turkey's most exclusive bus, flight, and car rental companies under one platform. By comparing the most attractive options of all these companies, you can choose the most suitable ticket or car for you and purchase or make a reservation with a single click.
Unconditional Refund Guarantee
You can cancel your bus or flight ticket purchased with Obilet until the last 24 hours before your trip. Your fee will be refunded without any deductions.
The Comfortable Way of Bus Travel
Kamil Koç, Metro Turizm, Pamukkale Turizm, Ali Osman Ulusoy, Varan Turizm, and many more bus companies are on Obilet with attractive prices! Use the Obilet app to choose your desired destination and date, and instantly buy your cheap bus ticket!
Reach out to Turkey's Most Exclusive Airline Companies with Obilet!
Obilet allows you to buy your cheap flight ticket on a single platform. Whether it is a business trip or a tourist trip, the advantageous prices of flight tickets are on Obilet! You can find tickets from Turkey's most distinguished airline companies, especially Turkish Airlines (THY), Anadolu Jet, Pegasus, and Sun Express, at affordable prices on Obilet. You can purchase one-way or round-trip flight tickets for your domestic and international travels without delay and perform ticket inquiries.
Make Your Hotel Reservation with a Single Click
You can easily find more than 10,000 hotel options in Turkey on Obilet. Select your desired place and date, list the hotels, find the ideal one for you, and complete your hotel reservation in seconds! Make your hotel reservation with a single click through Obilet.
Your Rental Car Is Just a Click Away
When you need a rental car on your travels, Obilet is with you once again! You can rent a car on Obilet immediately. From Turkey’s top car rental companies like Green Motion, Garenta, Sixt, Europcar, and Rentgo, you can find the ideal car for you and rent it securely.
Obilet Is Also By Your Side for Ferry Travels
You can easily list all the ferry routes departing from Istanbul, Yalova, Bursa, and Balıkesir on Obilet. Plan your journey in advance, list the ferry routes, and buy your ticket instantly!
Download the Obilet mobile app now and start planning your trip!
Thank you for choosing Obilet.

description:
Türkiye is located in the paradise of cultural and natural assets of universal values that are considered to be the common heritage of all humanity.

Türkiye has the privilege to be a very valuable country in whole world with its ancient history, cultural codes, geographic researches and extensions. The museums of Türkiye, waiting arms wide open with its thousands of years of history, is now an application away.

Discover the Most Affordable Flight Ticket Prices with Pegasus App
Are you ready for your next trip? Are you looking for a flight ticket? It’s time to use the easy travel app by Pegasus for cheap air tickets to your selected destination. Click on the “search flights” button and follow these steps:
Click the single or return ticket options,
Find the nearest airport to your choice of city,
Browse the year, month and day on the calendar,
Tick your time preferences on the specified date, 
Wait for flight prices to appear on the screen.
Renewed User-Friendly Design
Every click saves your time. This easy-use plane tickets app helps you monitor the best deals on search cheap flights panel. Airlines tickets booking is reserved on the app memory. Log in to see your reserved flight with the date, time and flight prices. What is more on Pegasus flight ticket app?
Check low-cost travel by the compare flights and ticket fares options.
Screen your Boarding Pass on the app.
Click on Extras icon to check and pay ticket charges for exceeding amounts of luggage.
Use the My Trips icon to get access to your reservation flight and previous travel tickets.
Easy Reservation
Flight ticket booking app designed for Pegasus passengers keep an easy travel motto. Book a flight and pay for your airline tickets after several browses and clicks. 
Fast and Secure Payment Process
Complete your flight reservation with easy payment steps. Pegasus App keeps your personal and financial details private during payment steps. Encrypted data on the app enables secure payment with a fast connection to your selected bank. You can prefer credit cards or payment orders from several options to buy your airline ticket. Pegasus app helps you freeze the ticket price if you don’t finish the payment immediately. You can pay in any currency of your choice.
BolBol Privileges
Pegasus stands out with its Gift Card and BolBol credits. BolBol members get the benefits of this frequent flier program.
Earn extra BolPoints by shopping at Pegasus BolBol shop. 
No need to remember your PNR number, BolBol membership does it for you!
Double your BolPoints by spending on the Pegasus app.
Book international flights or a ticket to domestic airports using your BolPoints.
Pegasus cheap airline tickets are available not only for BolBol members but also for their spouses, children and associates. 
Additional Services

Download Pegasus App to get the comfort of fully planning your flight, accommodation, transport, and insurance needs. You can directly access Additional Services by clicking the ¨More Services¨ icon. What kind of services are available on the Pegasus flight ticket booking app?  
Book your hotel, B&B accommodation and airport transfer via Pegasus offers.
Rent a car at your final destination using packages by Pegasus partners.
Buy travel insurance connected to your flight ticket. 
Show your affection by sending your loved ones a Gift Card to enable their free trips. 

Advantages of Using the Pegasus App
Flight search on the app monitors cheap flight tickets for the specified dates just with a click.
Join the BolBol members family to collect BolPoints for discount tickets. 
Activate the Notifications of special offers to plan your next travel search.
Use Travel Assistant under the ¨My Trips¨ menu to manage your seat reservation, add meals, pay for extra baggage and see urgent notifications.

Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable, whether you're requesting a taxi for a trip or arranging a train journey.

Pick from a wide range of travel options that the Uber app has to offer including:
UberX: Affordable, everyday rides
Lux: Luxury cars with top-rated drivers for premium travel experiences
Electric: Sustainable rides in electric vehicles for eco-friendly trips
UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6, perfect for family trips
Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom to enhance your travel
Uber Pet: Ride with your pet
Reserve: Choose your exact pickup time up to 90 days in advance for planned trips
Exec: High-end cars with top-rated drivers, ideal for business travel
2-wheels: You can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app. Find a scooter to start riding today for quick trips
Assist: Special assistance from trained drivers for accessible travel
Access: Wheelchair accessible vehicles ensuring inclusivity in travel
Black Cab: travel with the iconic London taxi

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival, whether it's a taxi ride or train. 

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable in their travel and on trips.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from £0 Delivery Fee and up to 5% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 5-10% off eligible rides, and £5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. Extra wait time included to meet your ride. Cancel at no charge up to 60 minutes in advance.

TRAVEL
Get train, coach, and flight ticketing right on the Uber app. Get 10% back in Uber Credits and collect Avios when you book train, coach, and Eurostar trips. No booking fee. Make any flight flexible and refundable and avoid flight travel stress with flight disruption protection.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. Get great prices & selection from the best rental companies.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favourite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience, and pet supplies, and get them all delivered.
Uber Boat: Get fast, reliable river boat services in London. For commuters and visitors. Routes run from 24 piers across the capital.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber is available in the following cities: London, Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed.

Are you ready to discover the World with Turkish Airlines privileges? BRAND NEW DISCOVERIES

Explore the World with AJet

With our mobile app designed to make your flight experience perfect, you can easily plan your travels, manage your bookings, and do much more. AJet offers a first-class travel experience that allows you to reach every corner of the world while keeping your budget intact.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN

• We offer a brand-new design for a user-friendly experience. Easily plan your travels, purchase tickets, and complete check-in procedures.

BOOKING MANAGEMENT

FAST AND SECURE PAYMENT

REGISTER

ADDITIONAL SERVICES

TRAVEL-ENHANCING DETAILS

The AJet mobile app is constantly evolving to help you explore the world. Join us for the best travel experience and enjoy your journeys to the fullest!

developer: ENUYGUN COM INTERNET BILGI HIZMETLERI TEKNOLOJI VE TICARET A S
description:
Affordable flight tickets, hotel reservations, bus tickets, car rentals, and transfer services are all on ENUYGUN! Compare, personalize, see the best deals, and enjoy a unique travel experience. Access flight tickets, bus tickets, hotel reservations, car rentals, and transfer services in seconds from a single platform. Download ENUYGUN to discover domestic and international travel opportunities!

ENUYGUN's Travel Services

Flight Tickets: Compare flights from popular Turkish airlines such as Turkish Airlines (THY), AJet (AnadoluJet), Pegasus (Flypgs), and SunExpress, as well as global ones like Emirates, Lufthansa, Qatar Airways, Wizz Air, KLM, Ryanair, British Airways, and Corendon. Book quickly and easily with affordable flight tickets and exclusive flight deals. Plan your travel according to your budget.

Bus Tickets: Compare tickets from bus companies such as Metro Turizm, Pamukkale Turizm, Kale Seyahat, Istanbul Seyahat, Ulusoy, Efe Tur, Has Turizm, and Nilufer Turizm. Find budget-friendly bus tickets for your intercity travel needs and plan your journey quickly with ENUYGUN.

Hotel Reservations: Explore thousands of hotel options in popular destinations like Antalya, Bodrum, Fethiye, Kas, Cesme, Marmaris, Cappadocia, Istanbul, and Izmir. From beachfront hotels to city stays, all-inclusive resorts to honeymoon getaways, compare and book your ideal accommodation. Take advantage of exclusive campaigns and early booking opportunities to align your holiday with your budget.

Car Rentals: Compare offers from global and local car rental companies such as Garenta, Avis, Budget, Enterprise, Sixt, Europcar, QCAR, Autoland, Everyday, RentGo, Wish, and Green Motion. Easily meet your needs for economic cars, luxury vehicles, family-sized cars, or long-term rentals.

Transfers: ENUYGUN offers reliable transfer options for your hotel-to-airport or airport-to-hotel transportation needs. Plan a comfortable journey with budget-friendly solutions for group or private transfers.

Affordable Prices and Secure Payments

Price Graph: View flight ticket prices over a wide date range to easily find the best deals for your budget.  
Price Alert: This feature tracks flight ticket prices for you and notifies you instantly when prices drop.  
Cancellation Policy: With the "My Ticket is Safe" service, cancel your ticket up to 3 hours before departure and receive a refund of 90% of the ticket price.  
Online Booking and Secure Payment: Your credit card information is protected by PCI DSS Level 3-certified infrastructure. Perform all your transactions safely with ENUYGUN.  

ENCuzdan: Transfer your credit card or bank card points to your ENCuzdan and use them as Turkish Lira value for flight tickets, bus tickets, or hotel reservations.

Personalization Features

Reservation Management: Save your information and credit card details to complete your transactions faster.  
Multiple Accounts: Add frequent travel companions or family members to your passenger list to streamline group bookings.  
All Trips in One Place: View all your pending, past, or current travel plans from a single screen.  
Favorites List: Create a favorites list for your trips and quickly plan future travels with your preferred flights and accommodations.  

New Travel Experiences

Budget-Friendly Trips: Plan your holidays with affordable flight tickets, bus tickets, hotel reservations, and car rental options. Discover early booking deals and unmissable campaigns.  
International Travel: Explore Europe's historic cities, Asia's tropical destinations, or America's popular spots. Find the best flight tickets on ENUYGUN and plan your dream international trip effortlessly.  
Comfortable Vacations: Enjoy a range of options from honeymoon hotels to family-friendly accommodations, spa experiences, and all-inclusive resorts.  

Download the ENUYGUN mobile app now and start planning your trips easily!

GPS Camera combines location tagging with powerful map and travel tools. Capture photos with GPS details, explore interactive maps, check traffic updates, and access essential navigation features in one application.

Main Features:
- GPS Camera: Capture photos with location, date, and time details.
- Live Cameras: View selected public cameras from different locations.
- 360 View: Explore panoramic images for a wider perspective.
- Earth 3D Map: Navigate the globe with interactive 3D views.
- Traffic Map: Stay updated with traffic conditions in real time.
- Famous Places: Discover landmarks and attractions worldwide.
- Compass: Find accurate directions easily.
- Air Quality: Check local air conditions instantly.
- World Clock: Track multiple time zones in one place.

Why GPS Camera:
- Simple all in one design.
- Practical features for daily use and travel.
- Reliable navigation and exploration tools.

Yandex Go
Rides, Market, scooters, package and food delivery

• RIDES
Pick your service class
Ride Economy for everyday errands. Comfort and Comfort+ to relax with more legroom. Minivan for big groups, traveling with skis or bicycles, or trips to the airport.

• SCOOTERS
Bright yellow Yandex Go scooters are already cruising cities. Rent up to three scooters from the same account, buy Minute Bundles to make rides more affordable, and use Yandex Plus to subscribe to Scooters for free unlocks.

• FOOD FROM RESTAURANTS
Order delivery from independent and popular chain restaurants. Stock up on snacks for a party, soup, khachapuri, wok, sushi, pizza, and vegan options.

• MARKET YANDEX GO
Market Yandex Go offers dozens of categories and millions of important, useful items in Russia and Uzbekistan. Enjoy the user-friendly search or select the categories to find what you're looking for. Add items to your cart, place and track your order — all in the Yandex Go app.
If you've already added items to your Yandex Market cart, you'll see your order in Yandex Go and can continue checkout there. If an item is out of stock, we'll suggest alternatives at about the same price.

• DELIVERY
Have a courier pick up your printer after repairs, hand over documents to a contractor, or haul off that old couch you sold. For large items, you can order a cargo truck. Couriers will arrive for pickup in just 15 minutes.

• TRANSPORT
View schedules for buses, trams, commuter trains, and other public transport, compare routes, and find the nearest stops and convenient transfers. Available in some cities for now.
 
Availability of services and options may vary depending on the region.

TAG: Call & Go.

Register to TAG, Martı's new application, with your personal information and vehicle, and meet with people who want to travel within the scope of transportation as favor. Share your costs and contribute to the environment.

How to use TAG?
- Download the TAG Sürücü app!
- Register with your phone number.
- Upload your personal information and vehicle details.
- Become available in app after your profile is verified.
- Approve trip requests.
- Earn rewards as you make trips.

Anyone who wants a fast and comfortable journey can call a vehicle with TAG within the Martı application and go wherever they want, whenever they want. Sign up to TAG Sürücü, overcome the city's traffic with your friend and reach the place you want to reach in the fastest way possible!

AIRBNB MORE THAN AN AIRBNB
The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book and go.

BOOK A HOME AND GO WHERE HOTELS CAN’T
Explore 8+ million holiday rentals in 240+ countries and regions to find the perfect stay for every kind of trip, whether you’re travelling alone or with a group. Use over 80 filtering options to find the amenities you want, like a pool, a kitchen or accessibility features like step-free entry. View all the details of a place at a glance on the listing page and check out the ratings and reviews to see what other guests who’ve stayed there think about it too.

DON’T JUST SEE A PLACE, EXPERIENCE IT
Find thousands of experiences around the world, hosted by locals who know their city best – all vetted for quality based on a host’s expertise, reputation and authenticity. Uncover unique perspectives on landmarks and museums. Get a taste of local cuisine through cooking classes and food tours. Enjoy the great outdoors, an art workshop, a live performance and much more. Plus, check out Airbnb Originals – extraordinary experiences hosted by the world’s most interesting people, designed exclusively for Airbnb.

MAKE YOUR STAY EVEN MORE SPECIAL WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICES
Make the most of your stay by booking incredible services right at your Airbnb, like private chefs, photography, catering, prepared meals, hairstyling, nail treatments, make-up, massages, personal training and spa treatments – each offered by experienced service hosts who have been vetted for quality. You can book thousands of professional services at nearly every price, all in one app, all over the world. Best of all, you don’t need to stay at an Airbnb or even be on a trip to get these services. Schedule a blow-dry, training session and more right at home.

GET A TRAVEL APP THAT TRAVELS WITH YOU
After you book a home, you’ll get personalised recommendations on the home page suggesting services and experiences for your trip, tailored to where you’re staying and who you’re travelling with. And the redesigned Profile gives you a snapshot of all the places you’ve been to on Airbnb and the people you’ve met along the way.

FIND ALL YOUR TRIP INFO IN ONE PLACE
Quickly find or share the details of your reservation – making it easier for everyone to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi with just a tap. Our in-app messaging means every guest on the trip can easily communicate with hosts to say hi, ask questions and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates. You can also share photos, videos and even customise an Airbnb Service, all in the same chat. And with a day-by-day view of everything you’ve booked in the updated Trips tab, it’s simple to keep track of your plans and get key details like check-in times, special instructions and entry codes all in one place, even when you’re offline.

WANT TO HOST? AIRBNB MAKES IT EASY.
Whether you want to host a home, experience or service, you can reach millions of people travelling and grow your business on Airbnb. List your home in a few simple steps. Or, you can apply to host an experience or service and once approved, you’re ready to welcome the world.

YOU’VE COME THIS FAR – NOW GO FURTHER
Stop reading and fire up the app to book yourself a one-of-a-kind trip on Airbnb.

developer: TC Devlet Demiryollari Tasimacilik A.S. Genel Mudurlugu
description:
TCDD Taşımacılık AŞ artık cebinizde. 

TCDD Taşımacılık AŞ, iletişim ve bilişim teknolojisinin sunduğu fırsatlarla daha hızlı ve daha rahat yolculuk imkanı sunuyor. 
Gişeye Gelmeden Online Bilet Alabilirsiniz
Elektronik Yolcu Bilet İşlemleri Sistemi (EYBİS) ile gişelere gelmeden mobil uygulamadan, internetten, çağrı merkezinden biletinizi alabilirsiniz. 
Satış işleminin tamamlanmasının ardından biletiniz SMS ve e-posta ile tarafınıza gönderilir.
Trene binerken resimli bir kimlik belgesi ibraz etmek zorunludur.
Çağrı Merkezi
Çağrı Merkezi, 444 82 33 no.lu özel servis numarası ile 7 gün 24 saat size hizmet veriyor.
Çağrı Merkezimizden; yolcu, yük ve liman hizmetleri konusunda her türlü bilgi verilirken, biletle ilgili işlemlerle öneri ve şikâyetlere ilişkin hizmetler yapılıyor. 
Whatsapp üzerinden Anlık Şikâyet, Anlık Çözüm Uygulaması
0507 321 82 33 numaralı Whatsapp hattına 7/24 ulaştırılan mesajlarınıza 5-15 dakika içerisinde dönüş yapıyoruz. 
YHT Eğlence Sistemi ile Canınız Hiç Sıkılmaz 
YHT Eğlence Sistemi ile koltuklarda yer alan ekranlardan veya kendi dizüstü bilgisayar, tablet, cep telefonlarından bağlanarak film, müzik, e-kitap, oyun gibi içeriklere ulaşabilirsiniz. 
Yolcu Haklarınızı Öğrenin 
TCDD Taşımacılık trenlerinde seyahat eden yolcularımızın hakları vardır. 
Bu hakların bazıları şunlardır: 
Danışma hakkı
Kolay Bilet Satın Alma Hakkı
Güvenli Yolculuk ve Konfor Hakkı
Engelli ve Hareket Kabiliyeti Kısıtlı Yolcuların Yardım Talep Hakkı
Sefer İptalleri ve Tehirlerde Yolcu Hakları
Talep Öneri ve Şikâyet Hakkı 
Seyahati Gözünüzde Büyütmeyin, Yüksek Hızlı Trenle Çok Yakın
Yüksek hızlı trenle, Ankara-Konya, Ankara-Eskişehir, Ankara-İstanbul, Konya-İstanbul hatlarında hızlı konforlu seyahat keyfe dönüşür. 
YHT Bağlantılı Kombine Taşımacılıkla Yolları Kısaltın 
YHT bağlantılı otobüs, Dizel Tren Setleri ile Bursa, Kütahya, Afyonkarahisar, Karaman, Denizli, Antalya’ya YHT konforundan ve hızından faydalanarak kısa sürede gidebilirsiniz.


Trende seyahat konforunuza harika bir lokanta da eşlik ediyor
Yüksek hızlı trenler ile Doğu Ekspresi, Güney-Vangölü, İzmir Mavi, Konya Mavi Trenlerinde bulunan yemekli vagonlarda yiyecek ve içecek ihtiyacınızı karşılamanız mümkündür.
Trenlerde Seyahat Güvence Altında 
Meydana gelen tren kazalarında;
Yolcuların can kaybı ve yaralanmalarında,
Eşyalarının zarar görmesi durumunda,
mevzuat çerçevesinde tazmin edilir. 

YHT’lerde Bilet Tipleri
Değişiklik ve iade hakkına göre ücretlendirilen üç tür bilet bulunur.
“Hesaplı Bilet”, “Standart Bilet” ve “Esnek Bilet” 
Son Dakika Bileti Nasıl Alınır? 
Yolcular, biletlerini trenin çıkış istasyonundaki gişelerden 5 dakika öncesine kadar, 
Diğer satış kanallarından (internet, mobil, çağrı merkezi vb) ise trenin çıkış istasyonundan kalkışına 15 dakika öncesine kadar alabilir.
YHT, Anahat Trenlerinde Biletlerin Geçerliği
YHT ve anahat trenlerinde, biletler satıldığı tarih, sefer, vagon ve yer numarasında geçerlidir. Başka bir tarih ve seferde kullanılamaz. 
Anahat trenlerinde numarasız vagonlara yapılan satışlara ait biletler, biletin üzerinde belirtilen tarih ve seferde geçerlidir. Yolcunun kontrollerde biletini ispat etmesi yeterlidir.
Bölgesel Tren Biletlerinin Geçerliği
Bölgesel tren biletleri, yolculuk mesafesine bağlı olarak bölge, saat, gün ve sefer/ seferler bazında geçerlidir. 
Bölgesel tren seyahatlerinde fiziki bilet ibrazı zorunludur. 
Yolcular, geçerlik süresi içinde kullanılmayan bölgesel tren biletleri için herhangi bir hak talebinde bulunamaz.
Bölgesel tren biletleri tek yön bileti ise satıldığı gün, gidiş-dönüş bileti ise gidiş bileti satıldığı gün, dönüşü ertesi gün dâhil geçerlidir.

developer: EPT TICARET VE SANAL MAGAZACILIK ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
No more going to PTT branches to load HGS balance!

It is now very easy to load credits to your HGS with iPhone! With this application, your plate number and T.C. You can view the balance of all your HGS products by using your ID number, tax number or HGS ticket number, and you can top up easily and quickly with your credit card.

You can log-in with your PttAVM account. First load is FREE for the PttAVM customers!

In addition, with the newly added feature, you can make a Highway Vehicle Inspection Inquiry.

developer: TIKTAK YENI NESIL ULASIM COZUMLERI VE ARAC KIRALAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Arabanın kolayı TikTak’ta! 

Şehir fırsat dolu, heyecan dolu, hayat dolu biliyoruz. TikTak’ı bu geniş deneyim havuzunun içinde, hiçbir anı kaçırmamak için bir çözüm kaynağı olarak öne çıkarıyoruz. Dakikalar içerisinde arabaya erişmenin; evinden işine, kampüsten konsere ulaşmanın rahatlığını yaşatıyoruz. 

Üstelik rota özelliğiyle gideceğin yeri girdiğinde, taksiye göre çok daha avantajlı gidersin. Park yeri ararken ya da trafikte geçen süre için de ekstra süre hediyen var! 

TikTak ile farklı ihtiyaç ve zevkine uygun binlerce arabayı ister bireysel ister kurumsal olarak kullan, kiraladığın süre kadar öde, yakıt masrafını hiç düşünme. Büyükşehir Belediyeleri otoparkları veya KASDAŞ’larda ödediğinden fazlasını TikTak puan olarak kazan, dilediğin gibi harca! 

TikTak mobil uygulaması ile; 

Her ihtiyacına uygun çeşit çeşit farklı model binlerce arabadan dilediğini seç.

İster dakikalık ister günlük kiralamaya başla.

Sadece kullandığın kadar kredi kartınla öde. 

Rota özelliğiyle gideceğin yeri gir, fiyatı sabitle.

TikTakla Kazan dünyası ile günlük, haftalık, aylık ödüllerle puanları topla. Puanlarınla dilediğin gibi TikTakla!

İstanbul’dan sonra şimdi İzmir ve Ankara’da…

developer: IZMIR INOVASYON VE TEKNOLOJI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Manage Izmir public transportation in a single app: Create your digital Izmirim Kart, board with QR code, check and top up your balance; access stop, schedule, and route information instantly.


QR quick boarding: Pass through gates with your phone.
Digital/Virtual card: No physical card needed.
View balance and secure top-up.
Stop, schedule, line, and real-time arrival times.
Bisim stations, bike availability, and route planning.
Integrated with Metro, Tram, İZBAN, İZDENİZ, ESHOT, and buses.


Make daily travel in Izmir easier; English support for both locals and visitors. Izmirim Kart provides a seamless digital card experience within the municipal ecosystem.

From the developers of Getcontact, eSIM io: Enjoy seamless internet connection on your travels with eSIM io! eSIM io offers flexible data plans that best suit your trips, without the need for a physical SIM card or expensive operator packages!
 
Why eSIM io?
 
● One SIM: Add your eSIM to your device just once and use it anywhere in the world! No more having to add new eSIMs for every new plan or country you travel to. Connect to the internet from any country at any time with a single eSIM.
● Pay as You Go: You don't have to guess in advance how much data you will use. Use as much data as you want and only pay for what you use.
● Easy Tracking: Easily track your eSIM data usage details on our application and keep it under control.
 
 
What Does eSIM.io Offer You?
 
● Wide Coverage Network: With wide coverage around the world, you can always stay connected while traveling. Easily access the internet without having to deal with local carriers.
 
● Easy Installation and Use: You can connect to the internet in minutes with a simple and fast installation process. Thanks to its user-friendly interface, you can easily track your actions.
 
● Freedom of Flexible Data Usage: You can choose from a variety of data plans according to your needs or opt for a pay-as-you-go model.
 
● Ease of Payment: You can manage your payments through your io Balance. You can switch between pay-as-you-go model and flexible data plans and save.
 
How Does It Work?
 
● Download the App: Download the eSIM.io app quickly.
 
● Add One SIM: Add and activate your One SIM provided by eSIM io to your device.
 
● Add io Balance: Add io Balance to your account.
 
● Pay as You Go or Choose a Data Plan: You can either get a data plan for your destination country or start using data on a pay-as-you-go model.
 
● Keep Track: Easily track your data usage details from the My eSIMs menu in our app.
 
Support:
 
We are always ready to assist you.
 
Feedback and Support: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@esim.io.
 
Help & FAQ: Visit https://esimio.faq.desk360.com/ for more information.
 
eSIM.io makes your travels freer and more connected. Download now and enjoy uninterrupted internet access around the world!
 
 
For more information on Privacy and Terms of Service:
Privacy Policy: https://esim.io/en/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://esim.io/en/terms-of-service

Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars – all in one place.

No matter where you are – search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best air fare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights, Hotels and car hire with major airlines and providers  like Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways all in one place.  Save time and money by comparing fares across multiple airlines and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges—just the lowest prices on domestic and international flights.

But Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find budget-friendly hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and holiday rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable car hire from top providers, with options to filter by vehicle type, fuel policy, and more.
Here’s how to use our app:

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‘Everywhere’ in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next holiday.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your holiday. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about discounted flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, holiday apartment rentals , motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next holiday. 

Hire a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car hire, and we’ll show you affordable options from top car hire agencies, including Hertz, Avis, Enterprise and Europcar . You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back. 

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel and airlines, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place - easyJet, Ryanair, British Airways, Lufthansa, Wizz Air, Expedia, Booking.com, lastminute.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travellers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‘saved’ feature where you can ‘heart’ flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your holiday. 

Why Skyscanner?
• The Telegraph; “The only 20 travel apps you’ll ever need”
• The New York Times; “Apps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip”
• Elite Daily; “7 holiday travel apps that’ll let you jingle around the world’
• Pocket-lint; “4 apps to get you ready for summer”

• TikTok: @skyscanner
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/

Make getting around easier with Bolt! Whether you need a ride across town, an airport transfer, or a scooter to zip through traffic, our app makes it easy to move around confidently and conveniently.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT?
- Request a ride in seconds: enjoy safe, affordable rides with top-rated drivers.
- Transparent pricing: see your fare upfront so there are no surprises.
- Multiple payment options: pay securely using a credit/debit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or cash.

EASY ORDERING:
- Open the app and set your destination.
- Choose from various ride types to suit your needs (Comfort, Premium, Electric, XL, and more).
- Track your driver in real time.
- Arrive in comfort and rate your experience.

SAFETY FIRST:
Some of Bolt’s safety features require the app to run in the background.

- Emergency assist button: discreetly alert our Safety Team in case of emergencies.
- Audio trip recording: record audio during rides for added peace of mind.
- Private phone details: your contact information stays confidential when you call a driver.

PLAN AHEAD:
Need an airport transfer or an early morning ride? You can schedule your trip in advance from 30 minutes to 90 days before your expected pickup time.

*JOIN BOLT PLUS TO UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES!
Get the best of Bolt with Bolt Plus. Enjoy exclusive perks that save you time and money, making every ride smoother and more convenient.

*BOLT DRIVE:
We're committed to our carbon net zero goal by 2040. That's why we're increasing the lineup of electric and hybrid cars in Bolt Drive, our car-sharing service. You can also rent Bolt scooters and e-bikes via the app.

*DELIVER PACKAGES
Use the 'Send' ride type to arrange fast and convenient parcel delivery in your city.

Bolt is available in 50 countries and 600+ cities worldwide (see the full list at https://bolt.eu/en/cities/). We rebranded from Taxify to Bolt in 2019.

Bolt is the perfect taxi alternative for fast, reliable, and affordable rides. The app provides a seamless ride-ordering experience whether you’re commuting, travelling, or running errands. So, the next time you need a ride, choose Bolt!

*Bolt options differ by location. Check the app for availability in your city.

Earn money driving with the Bolt Driver app. Sign up: https://bolt.eu/driver/

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts, and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
X — https://x.com/Boltapp

The trivago app is the easy way to search and compare hotel prices from your favourite booking sites so you can find a hotel or accommodation in the location you want, with the amenities you need, and for a deal you’ll feel amazing about.

- Compare accommodation prices from major booking sites with one search
- Get exclusive mobile rates on your phone or tablet
- Get price drop alerts for your favourite hotels 
- Save favourite accommodations and compare them side-by-side
- Read aggregated guest reviews from multiple booking sites
- Search over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries and find amazing hotel deals

No matter what type of traveler you are, or what type of budget you have, the trivago app makes your hotel search simpler than ever.

Compare prices from hundreds of booking sites
With trivago, you don’t just search for hotel offers in your dream vacation destinations, you also get to compare prices from the major booking sites like Expedia, Hotels.com, ebookers, Travel Republic, Booking.com, Priceline, Trip.com, ZenHotels, TUI, TravelUp, loveholidays.com, and more. With over 5 million hotels and other accommodations to choose from worldwide, finding the right stay at the right price doesn’t get much easier than this.

Mobile rates for deal-hunters on the go
The trivago app features deals on hotels that you can only access on your mobile device — something all you deal-hunters out there won’t want to miss out on. Just search for your hotel like you normally would, and keep an eye out for the “mobile rate” badge to know when you’ve found a special deal.

Get a heads-up when prices drop
Have a trip coming up and want to try and book your stay for cheap? Now you can sign up for price drop alerts on the trivago app to stay on top of price changes for your favourite hotels. Instead of constantly searching, you’ll get notified as soon as prices drop so you can act fast and get an awesome deal.

Save favourites and compare them side-by-side
Whether your dream hotel is pet-friendly, has late-checkout, offers free cancellation, or includes a breakfast buffet, the trivago app makes it easy to save your favourite stays. When you feel like booking your trip, you can compare hotels from your favourites list side-by-side to see how they match up before making your decision, so can always be confident you got the right stay at the right price.

Real talk from real guests
Along with always-updating price information, the trivago app aggregates guest ratings from major booking sites to give you the best understanding of real-world experiences at each hotel. The trivago rating index creates a combined score of available ratings so that you can see what other guests have to say, and always be ready to book your room with confidence.

5 million hotel beds and counting
With over over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries, you can find the perfect stay for every trip on the trivago app. Find rooms at boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, bed and breakfasts, lodges, vacation rentals, resorts, and everything in between with one simple search.

Download trivago’s free app today and start searching, comparing, and saving on your next adventure.

Visit trivago.co.uk for more info.

GET REWARDED THROUGH OUR APP  

Members save up to 20% on over 100,000 hotels worldwide*. 

Silver, Gold and Platinum members can enjoy extra perks at selected VIP Access properties.

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION

- Contact us or the hotel or holiday rental owner directly from the app.

This app uses tracking technology. As disclosed in our Privacy Statement, we and our partners may collect personal information and other data. By using our app, you accept our Privacy Statement and Terms of Service. 

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our hotel app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

Introducing the New SunExpress App – Your Travel Companion, Reimagined

Welcome to the new SunExpress app – designed to make every step of your journey easier, faster, and more enjoyable. Whether you're booking a getaway or managing a flight on the go, everything you need is just a tap away. Whether you're a frequent flyer or planning your first trip, the new SunExpress app is built to give you more control, comfort, and confidence every step of the way.

Key Features:
 - Book flights quickly and easily
 - Modify your reservation with just a few taps
 - Purchase baggage, choose your favorite seat, or pre-order a delicious meal
 - Save your trip and access all booking details at a glance
 - Check in online and view your mobile boarding pass anytime
 - Stay informed with real-time updates and flight notifications

With SunExpress, everything you need for your journey is at your fingertips. The app supports multiple languages and is designed for iOS devices.

 Download the SunExpress app now and make your next flight easier than ever!
